newsitem.title: VENEZUELA: Venezuela to examine if Coke now a monopoly.
newsitem.headline: Venezuela to examine if Coke now a monopoly.

text.p: Venezuela is to examine PepsiCo's charge that Coca-Cola Co holds a monopoly position in the Venezuelan market.

Venezuela's Superintendency to Protect and Promote Free Competition (Procompetencia) said in a press release it had "opened investigations...as to whether anti-competitive practices were taking place".

It also ordered Coke to abstain from tampering with Pepsi inventory held in Coke bottling plants. The 18 Coke bottling plants, which belonged to Pepsi only one week ago, still hold Pepsi stock worth over two billion bolivars ($4 million).
